title: Scuttler Snowdown Icon not recieved
body:
So I mystery gifted a friend Fiora during Snowdown as a Xmas gift and also to get the rift scuttler icon. It's been a while and I still haven't received the icon yet, so what do I do?

Help appreciated.

replies.body: Snowdown icons are not done being distributed to eligible players.  AS with the Poro King Icon, any earnable icons are aimed to be sent out by the 23rd.  Hang tight until then!
Okay! Sorry, I thought they were done sending them out.
